column2: "Na Ziffo baa Saul hɔ wɔ Gibea
column3: dɛ
column4: Ana David nnsumaa noho wɔ Hakila koko a ɔwɔ Jesimon no boka afamu no do no bi a?"

column3: na osii mu kɔr Zifi sar no do
column4: na Israel mbarimba a wɔapa hɔn mpemebiasa ka no ho
column6: ɔrokɔhwehwɛ David wɔ Zifi sar no do."

column2: "Na Saul kyeer nsera wɔ Hakila koko a ɔwɔ Jesimon no
column3: wɔ ɔkwan nkyɛn. Na David dze ɔtsenaa sar no do
column4: na ohun dɛ Saul aka no do aba sar no do."

column3: na ohun dɛ Saul aba ampa."
na ɔbaa beebi mbrɛ Saul akyer nsera no: na David hun beebi mbrɛ Saul na ne sahen Abner
column4: Ner ne ba no dedae: na Saul daa mbrɛ ntseaseanam no sisii no ne ntamu hɔ
column5: na nkorɔfo no akyer nsera abɔ no aprɔw."

column3: na Zeruia ne ba Abishai
column4: Joab no nua no
column6: Woana na ɔnye me besian akɔ Saul nkyɛn wɔ nseraban no mu? Na Abishai see dɛ

column2: "Nna David na Abishai baa nkorɔfo no nkyɛn anadwe: na
column3: hwɛ
column4: Saul da mbrɛ ntseaseanam sisii no ne ntamu hɔ ɔada
column5: na ne peaa si famu wɔ n'etsifi: na Abner na nkorɔfo no deda hɔ bɔ no ho aprɔw."

column3: Nyankopɔn eyi wo tamfo ahyɛ wo nsa ndɛ: dɛm ntsi afei
column4: meserɛ wo
column5: ma memfa peaa no monwɔ no prɛko pɛr nkitsa daadze

column3: Mma nnsɛɛ no: na woana na obotum dɛ ɔtsen ne nsa ka EWURADZE ne nyia wɔasera no no
column4: na onnkedzi fɔ?"

column3: Dɛ EWURADZE tse ase yi
column4: EWURADZE boku no; anaa ne da bodu ma oewu; anaa ɔbɔkɔ akono na ɔakɔtɔ."

column2: "EWURADZE mpa ngu dɛ mebɛtsen me nsa maka nyia EWURADZE asera no no: na mbom meserɛ wo
column3: fa peaa no a osi n'etsifi no
column4: na nsubɔdambɔ no

column2: "Nna David faa peaa no na nsubɔdambɔ no
column3: wɔ Saul n'etsifi; na wɔkɔree
column4: na nyimpa biara ennhu
column6: nkyii so obiara ennyan: nna hɔn nyinara wɔadeda; osiandɛ nda heii fi EWURADZE hɔ atotɔ hɔn do."

column2: "Nna David twaa mu kɔr afa noho
column3: na okegyinaa bepɔw no etsifi ekyirekyir noho ara; ɔkwan kɛsenara da hɔn ntamu:"

column2: "na David tseatseaa mu frɛɛ nkorɔfo no
column3: na Ner ne ba Abner dɛ
column4: Abner
column5: ana nntse a? Nna Abner buae
column7: Ɔwo woana nye wo na etseatsea mu frɛ ɔhen no?"

column3: Ana nnyɛ ɔkobarimba nye wo bi a? Woana na ɔnye wo sɛ wɔ Israel mu? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi koraa na annweɔn wo wura ɔhen
column4: ma nkorɔfo yi hɔn mu baako baa hɔ dɛ nkyɛ ɔrebɛsɛɛ wo wura ɔhen yi?"

column2: "Adze a ayɛ yi onnye. Dɛ EWURADZE tse ase yi
column3: hom sɛ owu
column4: osiandɛ hom annweɔn hom wura
column5: EWURADZE ne nyia wɔasera no no. Na afei
column7: na nsubɔdambɔ no a osi n'etsifi no wɔ."

column2: "Na Saul hun dɛ David ne ndze a
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Ana wo ndze nye no a
column5: me ba David? Na David see dɛ

column3: Ebɛnadze ntsi na mo wura ritsiw n'akowaa yi? Mayɛ dɛn
column4: anaa ebɛn bɔn wɔ me nsamu?"

column3: meserɛ wo
column4: wɔmma mo wura ɔhen ntsie n'akowaa ne nsɛm. Sɛ EWURADZE na oenunu wo dɛ soɛr mo do a
column5: ɔno ma ɔngye mpata afɔr: na sɛ adasamba dze a
column6: ɔno mpaa nka hɔn wɔ EWURADZE enyim: osiandɛ woeyi me edzi ndɛ dɛ mma memmfam EWURADZE n'egyapadze ho
column7: na wɔretseetsee me araa ma maakɔsom enyame fofor."

column3: mma mo bɔgyaa mmfi EWURADZE enyim nngu famu: osiandɛ Israelhen epue rohwehwɛ ɔkramandwuw
column4: dɛ mbrɛ obi ritsiw akokɔhwerɛw wɔ mbepɔw do."

column3: Mayɛ bɔn: san bra
column4: me ba David: na merennyɛ wo bɔn bio
column5: osiandɛ mo nkwa asom bo wɔ w'enyi do ndɛ da yi: hwɛ

column3: Hwɛ
column4: peaa no nye yi
column5: ɔhen! Afei ma mberantsɛ no mu baako mbra mbɛfa."

column2: "Na EWURADZE bɛdan nyimpa biara ne ndzeyɛtsenenee na no nokwardzi ama no; susuampa dɛ EWURADZE yii wo hyɛɛ me nsa ndɛ da yi
column3: na mammpɛ dɛ metsen me nsa ka nyia EWURADZE asera no no."
hwɛ
column4: dɛ mbrɛ wo nkwa soom bo ndɛ da yi wɔ m'enyi do no
column5: dɛmara so na wɔmma emi so mo nkwa nsom bo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column6: na wɔmma onyi me mfi ahohiahia nyinara mu."

column2: "Nna Saul kaa wɔ ne tsirmu dɛ
column3: Nhyira nka wo
column4: me ba David: etumdze ara na ebɛyɛ
column5: na konyim ara so na ibedzi. Nna David sii mu kɔr no kwan
column6: na Saul so sanee kɔr ne tsenabew."
